cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 95 mi ENE of Daytona Beach, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest parallel to the Florida east coast, then turning north and northeast toward the South-Carolina/North-Carolina coasts
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of South Carolina (near Charleston–Cape Romain area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch north of Surf City NC to Poquoson VA; Hurricane Watch north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River GA and north of Surf City NC to NC/VA border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Surf City NC; Hurricane Warning Volusia/Brevard County line FL to Ponte Vedra Beach FL and north of Savannah River to Surf City NC; Tropical Storm Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Volusia/Brevard County line FL and north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River GA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire southeast U.S. coastline from central Florida northward through Georgia and the Carolinas
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (<5%) of brief tropical-storm-force gusts as outer bands brush far southeast Florida.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal inundation (generally <2 ft) possible due to persistent onshore swell and tides.
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered squalls could bring 1–3 inches of rain; widespread heavy rainfall not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along Broward County beaches.
